bill.title: Mississippi Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act; create.
bill.description: An Act To Create The Mississippi Public Utility Regulatory Act; To Provide Certain Definitions; To Provide That This Act Shall Apply To The Regulation Of Sales And Purchases Between Certain Qualifying Facilities And Electric Utilities That Are Subject To The Jurisdiction Of The Public Service Commission; To Provide That Certain Contracts Between Certain Utilities And Facilities Are To Be Filed With The Commission; To Provide That Certain Electric Utilities Shall Make Interconnections With Any Qualifying Facility As May Be Necessary To Accomplish Purchases Or Sales As Provided For Under This Act; To Require Electric Utilities To Make Certain Purchases From Qualifying Facilities; To Provide Certain Aspects For The Rates Of Such Purchases; To Provide That Electric Utilities Shall Sell To Any Qualifying Facility Energy In The Capacity Requested By The Facility; To Provide That Certain Qualifying Facilities Are Exempt From Certain State Laws; And For Related Purposes.
